name: mutation-report-publisher
description: With this extension you add the mutation report to your build summary so you can view the mutation test result on azure devops.
author: Rouke Broersma

scripts.package: lerna run compile && tfx extension create --rev-version
scripts.package:dev: lerna run compile:dev && tfx extension create
scripts.publish: lerna run compile && tfx extension publish
scripts.publish:dev: lerna run compile:dev && tfx extension publish
